name: Rock 'em Sock 'em Quadruplets
description:
This game isn't really eligible for Fantasic Arcade, but I couldn't resist the theme :)

Twins Danny DeVito and Arnold Schwarzenegger have met their evil (?) counterparts and must take them down! Think Rock 'em Sock 'em Robots, but the robots' heads are Danny DeVito.

Blue Player Controls
  • A: Punch forward
  • D: Punch backward
  • Space: Hold down to charge power attack, let go to unleash
Orange Player Controls
  • Left arrow: Punch forward
  • Right arrow: Punch backward
  • Enter: Hold down to charge power attack, let go to unleash
